title: Border, 2010-31-54, 1928–1929
provenance: Donor purchased the two Grantil sample books from a private collector in France ca. 2000. For the remaining non-Grantil pieces, the French, Belgian and English papers were acquired from various sources in Europe, while the American samples were acquired from private collections in the United States.
description: Swag of orange-red fruits and purple flowers with leaves. Landscape scene behind fruit with blue trees and tan background. Blue bricks frame the top and bottom of border.
